job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: strongCommunication has changed for people Its changed for businesses toobrbrstrongIntercom is the only suite of customer messaging products that drives growth at every stage of the customer lifecycleacross acquisition engagement and support Today more than 30000 businesses use Intercom to connect with a billion people worldwidebrbrJoin the company helping businesses grow revenue through live chat and so much morebrbrstrongWhats the opportunity brbrstrongAt Intercom Analytics amp Data Science teammates partner with every function in the organization in order to help teams make datainformed decisions and take datainformed actions Were highly quantitative individuals who love to turn data into insights and communicate our findings fearlessly and were looking for people with a similar mindset who are constantly curious driven to understand our business better and committed to creating valuebrbrIn this role you will partner with gotomarket teams across Intercom including Marketing BizOps Finance Growth RampD and Sales to measure new initiatives make datadriven recommendations around gotomarket strategy and help identify areas to leverage automation In addition to being experienced analytically were looking for someone who can proactively surface recommendations and insights and who can work across the analytics and data stack in order to solve problems If this sounds like you we would love to hear from youbrbrTo give you a sense of some specific projects you might work on here are a few of our recent workstreams understanding how users respond to new pricing amp packaging understanding and modeling drivers of expansion analyzing the customer signup experience measuring the performance of paid advertising campaigns prioritizing the leads our sales team should reach out to building attribution models and many morebrbrstrongWhat will I be doing brstrongulliEvaluating the performance of our gotomarket strategies and initiatives by analyzing customer funnels and metrics new business attribution retention CAC LTV churn etcliliPartnering with the Marketing team at Intercom to help them better understand their functional areas through use of our dataliliBuilding data science models to accelerate the business by providing deeper insights into prospect and customer behaviorsliliCreating dashboards that allow internal consumers to gain insight into the performance of their functional areasliliTransforming data from data warehouse tables into data artifacts to power analyses and dashboards for companywide useliliMonitoring the state of the business on a regular basis and generating datadriven hypotheses and action items in order drive business impactbrliulstrongWhat skills do I need brstrongulli3 years of work experience in analyticsdata science role OR 1 years of work experience in analyticsdata science role and advanced degree in Statistics Econometrics Computer Science or related quantitative fieldliliA proven track record of initiating and delivering actionable analysesrecommendations in order to drive business impactliliExperience working in a technology business and understanding SaaS business models and key metricsliliSome experience building data science models to provide deeper insights and putting them in productionliliExcellent communication skills technical and nontechnical and comfort working with highlevel stakeholdersliliAbility to work independently and collaboratively in a dynamic environmentliliExcellent SQL skills for querying fluency with BIvisualization tools for reporting and expert knowledge of ExcelGoogle SheetsliliExperience with RPython for statistical analysis a plusliliStrong critical reasoning skills including understanding of common pitfalls of data analysisliliMotivation to continue learning as a data scientist contributing fresh ideas and helping establish best practices brliulstronguBenefits brbrustrongWe are a welltreated bunch with awesome benefits If theres something important to you thats not on this list talk to us brulliCompetitive salary and meaningful equityliliCatered lunch and dinner served every weekday plus a variety of breakfast foods and a fully stocked kitchenliliFully funded comprehensive medical dental and vision coverageliliOpen vacation policy and 10 corporate holidaysliliPaid Parental Leave ProgramliliCommuter benefits  401k planliliInoffice bicycle storageliliMacbooks are our standard but were happy to get you whatever equipment helps you get your job doneliliFun events for Intercomrades friends and familyliul
